content.webTitle: Escape's picks of the week: The food festival

fields.headline: The food festival
fields.bodyText: The Jesmond Dene House hotel (0191 212 3000) in Newcastle is hosting its first food and wine festival to show off the region's produce from 8-16 April. More than 15 top chefs, including Paul Rankin, Michel Bourdin and Terry Laybourne, will be cooking and giving demonstrations, and wine experts will be on hand at dinner.
